amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out a rule and notice of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3897 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 37. Record Vote Number: 81.

Amendment SA 3897 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2733; text: CR S2733) To prohibit the use of funds to carry out a rule and notice of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3897 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 37. Record Vote Number: 81.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3897 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 3896.
